notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization: M.F.V.G., M.E.G. and A.T. Formal analysis: M.F.V.G. and M.E.G. Funding acquisition: A.T. Investigation: M.F.V.G., M.E.G., A.T. and E.F.L. Methodology: M.F.V.G. and M.E.G. Project administration: A.T., M.F.V.G. and E.F.L. Resources: A.T. Supervision: A.T. and M.E.G. Validation: A.T., M.E.G., M.F.V.G. and E.F.L. Visualization: M.F.V.G., M.E.G., A.T. and E.F.L. Writing – original draft: M.F.V.G., M.E.G. and A.T. Writing – review & editing: M.F.V.G., M.E.G., A.T. and E.F.L.
